mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.username, u.name as user_name, p.package_name, t.date as appointment_date, t.start_time, t.end_time, d.department_name FROM exam_appointment a LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN exam_package p ON a.package_id = p.id LEFT JOIN exam_time_slot t ON a.time_slot_id = t.id LEFT JOIN sys_department d ON t.department_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.*, p.package_name, t.date as appointment_date, t.start_time, t.end_time, d.department_name FROM exam_appointment a LEFT JOIN exam_package p ON a.package_id = p.id LEFT JOIN exam_time_slot t ON a.time_slot_id = t.id LEFT JOIN sys_department d ON t.department_id = d.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.*, u.username, u.name as user_name, p.package_name, t.start_time, t.end_time FROM exam_appointment a LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN exam_package p ON a.package_id = p.id LEFT JOIN exam_time_slot t ON a.time_slot_id = t.id WHERE t.department_id = #{departmentId} AND t.date = #{date} AND a.status = 1 ORDER BY t.start_time
